UnifyingAPI
Class Channel

java.lang.Object
  UnifyingAPI.Channel

public class Channel
extends java.lang.Object

A data channel. Created by parsing a channel packet.

Author:
Greg Clark

setDimensions

public boolean setDimensions(int... args)
Sets the dimensions of the channel. Returns true if properly set

Parameters:
args - the new dimensions to set. The final dimension should be the one closest together in memory
Returns:
true if and only if product of args is equal to this channel's number of Tuples

getTuple

public Tuple getTuple(int... indices)
               throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
Get tuple using integer dimensions.

Parameters:
indices - of tuple, 0-indexed. e.g. 639,479 for last pixel in a VGA image
Returns:
the Tuple
Throws:
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the dimensionality is higher than this Channel's dimensionality or if the calculated index is too high
